articles.title: Dolly Parton shares her morning routine - TODAY
articles.description: Dolly Parton shared her morning routine that starts at 3 a.m. and what she likes to make her husband of 54 years for breakfast.
articles.content:
Dolly Parton's favorite time of the day is not 9 to 5. It's more like 3 to 7.
The 74-year-old country music legend gave some insight into her (very early) morning routine in an interview with RuPaul… [+3992 chars]

articles.title: Did a mountain lion kill a Texas man? Medical examiner and wildlife experts disagree - USA TODAY
articles.description: A Texas medical examiner said Christopher Allen Whiteley was killed by a wild animal, possibly a mountain lion. State wildlife officials disagree.
articles.content:
